meanings: (고장 난 물건 등을) repair, fix, mend (=수리하다)

vlive.korean: 넌 그거 못 고쳐 - 들어갈 마음도 없어! You can't fix that. - I have no will to go in! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 우당탕식스의 (..버퍼링 중입니다..) 오째 생일파티🦀🎉 (HAPPY DAEHWI DAY!)
vlive.english: You can't fix that. - I have no will to go in!

vlive.korean: '것만 같아'부터 고쳐? Correct from "As if"? 듣기 View video NCT LIFE / 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] #최초공개 #심포유OST #아름다워 #녹음비하인드

vlive.korean: 제가 이미 다 고쳐가지고 너무 아쉽네요 그렇죠? I've already got rid of my dialect. It's too bad, isn't it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong sewoon X LieV - 정세운의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: I've already got rid of my dialect. It's too bad, isn't it?

examples.korean: The report was redrafted to remove gender-specific language. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 보고서는 한 쪽 성에만 국한되는 어구들을 없애도록 다시 고쳐 썼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The report was redrafted to remove gender-specific language. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My lipstick needed a touch-up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 립스틱을 재빨리 고쳐 발라야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My lipstick needed a touch-up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll have a go at fixing it tonight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 오늘 밤에 그걸 한번 고쳐 볼게. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll have a go at fixing it tonight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He cleaned up his act and came off drugs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 나쁜 버릇을 고쳐 약물을 끊었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He cleaned up his act and came off drugs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Could you mend my bike for me? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제 자전거 좀 고쳐 주실 수 있어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could you mend my bike for me? Add to Wordbook
